participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is ambitious, caring, and values her relationships deeply. She is a dreamer who aims to make a positive impact in the world.
participant_1.background: I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend. I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents. I don't like to dress up because I am more comfortable in my own clothes. I treasure the time I spend with my dog, George. I haven't spoken to my family in years.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is creative, resilient, and enjoys the little things in life. He is hardworking and balances his responsibilities with a passion for music.
participant_2.background: I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together. I had to learn how to balance my time between my two jobs while also taking care of my family. I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery. I want to take my uniform off and relax. I'm a person who can enjoy the simple things in life and also be prepared for whatever comes my way.

content.text: I want to be a doctor one day. I want to help people and make a difference in the world.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll do great things. I've always wanted to be a musician. I love to play the guitar and sing.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably the Beatles. They're so classic and timeless.
I love the Beatles too! They're one of my favorite bands. I'm more of a classic rock fan, but I like a little bit of everything.
Me too. I like to listen to all kinds of music. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I know what you mean. I love to listen to music when I'm working out or just hanging out. It's always a good time.
Yeah, it's the best! I love music.
